name: StandardFilterInfoPicklist

methods.name: getDefaultValue
methods.description: Returns the default value for the standard filter picklist.

methods.name: getFilterValues
methods.description: Returns a list of standard filter picklist values.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the display name of the standard filter picklist.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of the standard filter picklist.

description: Contains information about the standard filter picklist, such as the display name and type of the filter field, the default picklist value, and a list of all possible picklist values.
